name: display_file
description:
Display the contents of a file to the user while returning only metadata to the AI assistant. IMPORTANT: Do not use this tool to return file contents to the AI assistant; instead use the request_file tool.

The tool will show the user the file contents with appropriate formatting (syntax highlighting for text files, proper rendering for images) but the AI will only receive metadata like file size, type, and last modified date. This separation ensures user privacy while allowing the AI to track file states and metadata.  The tool will:
1. Read and display the file contents to the user, based on type:
   * Text files: Displayed with syntax highlighting when possible
   * Images: Displayed inline with appropriate sizing
   * Other formats: Shows metadata and format information

2. Size Limits:
   * Text files: 1MB display limit, 10MB hard limit
   * Images: 5MB display limit, 20MB hard limit
   * Files exceeding limits show truncated content or error

3. Format Support:
   * Text: All text formats including code and markdown
   * Images: All browser-supported formats (PNG, JPEG, GIF, etc.)
   * Other: Basic metadata display
